Translations.Text: In acknowledgment of the established tradition of Quraysh
their tradition of the winter and summer caravans
so let them worship the Lord of this House
who has preserved them from hunger and secured them from fear
Have you seen him who denies the deen
He is the one who harshly rebuffs the orphan
and does not urge the feeding of the poor
So woe to those who do salat
and are forgetful of their salat
Truly We have given you the Great Abundance
So pray to your Lord and sacrifice
It is the one who hates you who is cut off without an heir
